remarks: Lemma for ~ ablfac .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)
statement:
ablfac.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablfac.c $e |- C = { r e. ( SubGrp ` G ) | ( G |`s r ) e. ( CycGrp i^i ran pGrp ) } $.
ablfac.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablfac.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
ablfac.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
ablfac.a $e |- A = { w e. Prime | w || ( # ` B ) } $.
ablfac.s $e |- S = ( p e. A |-> { x e. B | ( O ` x ) || ( p ^ ( p pCnt ( # ` B ) ) ) } ) $.
ablfac.w $e |- W = ( g e. ( SubGrp ` G ) |-> { s e. Word C | ( G dom DProd s /\ ( G DProd s ) = g ) } ) $.
ablfaclem2.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> Word C ) $.
ablfaclem2.q $e |- ( ph -> A. y e. A ( F ` y ) e. ( W ` ( S ` y ) ) ) $.
ablfaclem2.l $e |- L = U_ y e. A ( { y } X. dom ( F ` y ) ) $.
ablfaclem2.g $e |- ( ph -> H : ( 0 ..^ ( # ` L ) ) -1-1-onto-> L ) $.
ablfaclem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( W ` B ) =/= (/) ) $.
